duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage all warehouse employees and the functions of the warehouse.
Establish and maintain operational procedures for shipping, receiving, inventory, and materials handling.
Collaborate with department leaders to ensure coordination of warehouse activities with production, sales, and purchasing.
Develop and maintain an operating budget for the warehouse, including repairs and maintenance, expenses, and wages.
Assist with month-end inventory and contribute to the cycle count program.
Partner with Health & Safety and Quality Assurance to ensure employee safety and product quality in the warehouse.
Lead or assist in critical warehouse enablement projects locally and divisionally.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED equivalent and 10+ years’ experience in industrial warehouse operations. Degree preferred.
Previous experience in a food manufacturing facility.
Previous leadership experience and ability to lead, direct, and motivate others.
Must be flexible and available to work selective weekends, holidays, and extra hours.
